attributes.action: Oppose the National Planning Policy Framework (Community Involvement) Bill 2013-14
attributes.additional_details:
Oppose this bill:
Which seeks to abolish the Planning Inspectorate and abolish requirement for 20% ‘buffer’ of deliverable housing sites.

For details on what this Bill involves please refer to the following link:

http://blogs.lexisnexis.co.uk/purposebuilt/bill-proposes-to-abolish-planning-inspectorate-and-cut-permitted-development-rights/

See the progress of the bill at this link:

http://services.parliament.uk/bills/2013-14/nationalplanningpolicyframeworkcommunityinvolvement.html
